item.title: New Hampshire Shooting Suspect Is Arraigned on Murder Charge

item.title: Manhattan Will Not Get a Casino as Final Proposal Is Voted Down
item.description: The defeat of a plan to build a casino just south of the United Nations headquarters leaves five remaining proposals, all outside Manhattan.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel’s Show to Return to ABC on Tuesday Night
item.description: The network’s removal of Mr. Kimmel’s show last week almost immediately morphed into a flashpoint for free speech in America.
